## Description {#details}

Simple state for a set.

This represents a state containing a set of values. The interface supports modelling sets that contain all possible elements. The state&#39;s internal value is modified using union or intersection operations.

Definition at line 3051 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
